findings.title: Excluded[] Length problem
findings.description: Transaction may fail if the length of Excluded array is very large.

findings.title: BEP20 Standard Violation
findings.description: Implementation of transfer() function does not allow the input of zero amount as itâ€™s demanded in ERC20 and BEP20 standards.

findings.title: Incorrect Error Message
findings.description: includeInReward() function displays an incorrect error message if the require statement fails.

findings.title: Contract gains non-withdrawable BNB
findings.description: The swapAndLiquify function converts half of the contractTokenBalance SVD tokens to BNB, leaving a small amount of BNB leftover in the contract.

findings.title: addLiquidity() recipient issues
findings.description: addLiquidity() function in LiquidityGeneratorToken contract calls for uniswapV2Router.addLiquidityETH() function with the parameter of lp tokens recipient set to owner address.

findings.title: Abuse ExcludeFromReward()
findings.description: The owner of the token contract can redistribute part of the tokens from users to a specific account.

findings.title: Missing Test Cases
findings.description: Test cases for the code and functions have not been provided.

findings.title: Public functions that could be declared external
findings.description: For all the public functions, the input parameters are copied to memory automatically, and it costs gas.

findings.title: Variables That Could Be Declared As Constant
findings.description: There are multiple variables in the contract, whose value is never updated.

findings.title: Missing zero check
findings.description: Contracts lack zero address checks, hence are prone to be initialized with zero addresses.

findings.title: Unindexed event parameters
findings.description: MinTokensBeforeSwapUpdated, SwapAndLiquify and SwapAndLiquifyEnabledUpdated events don't have any indexed parameters.

findings.title: Third Party Dependencies
findings.description: The logic of the contract requires it to interact with third-party protocols.

findings.title: Unnecessary require statement
findings.description: In the constructor, on line 988,989,990 there are three require statements which checks if provided value is greater than or equal to 0.

findings.title: Gas optimization: For loop optimization
findings.description: In includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply(), there is a for loop which iterates the value of _excluded.length times.

findings.title: Redundant Code
findings.description: The token _tokenTransfer() function in LiquidityGeneratorToken.sol, has an if-else block and in the second else if block, there is _transferStandard(sender, recipient, amount).

findings.title: Use of block.timestamp for trade deadline
findings.description: Deadline set as block.timestamp, which may add the risk of the transaction being reverted by router contract because of the expired deadline.

findings.title: Minimum amount to receive is 0
findings.description: Minimum amount of output tokens that must be received is 0, which allows trade to execute even when the output amount is very low.
